title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message:
Hello, 
I'm trying to repair an iMac A1418 (EMC 2638) which have a display fault. 
Seems on cold boot display works on a black screen; the time span is a few minutes before the display fails. 
I tried an external monitor and it works, correctly. 
The board is a 820-3588-A. 

When the display is active and alive, I think all values ??are ok: 
Diagnostic LED: # 1 ON # 2 ON # 3 ON # 4 ON 

J8100 
LED_RETURN_1 4.5V (sometimes 11,5V) 
LED_RETURN_2 4,5V (sometimes 11,5V ) 
LED_RETURN_3 4.5V (sometimes 11,5V) 
LED_RETURN_4 4.5V (sometimes 11,5V) 
LED_RETURN_5 4,5V (sometimes 11,5V) 
LED_RETURN_6 4,5V (sometimes 11,5V) 
BKLT_BOOST_1 61,3V
BKLT_BOOST_2 61.4V 

L440 
PP12V_LCD_F 12,1V 
PP12V_LCD 12,1V 

When the 
LED goes black, I have: Diagnostic LED: # 1 ON # 2 ON # 3 ON # 4 OFF 

J8100 
All 0V 

L440 
PP12V_LCD_F 12,1V 
PP12V_LCD 12,1V 

VSYNC Cable with no sign of shorts. 

Any hint? 
Thanks

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message:
I'm not sure if I correctly understood you.
Always has image, only disappers the backlight?

Did you try known good LCD and video cable?
Reseat video cable on the MLB and the backside of LCD too.

Any history available?

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message:
On cold boot always have an image. After random period, i have no image e no backlight.
I have also removed D4450 and replaced C4451 with a jumper (temporarily). Same behavior.
It's the lcd panel?

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message:
If image disappears too, try first other display.
Backlight issue should not block the image output.
Looks more like LCD issue...

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message: When the image and backlight both disappears, the 4th check LED goes off. Only chance is to replace the LCD? any chance to repair the lcd?

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message:
Try other display first; an LCD issue needs to be confirmed.
Be sure to have good contacts on both sides of video cable.
Also try other video cable.

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message: Ok, ordered a display and a new cable. I will be back after the installation. Thanks

title: Imac 21.5 late 2013 a1418 (emc 2638) display not working no 4th diagnostic led
message:
Installed new screen and all fine. 
It is not possible to repair the lcd board?
